name: Equipment Replacement in an Industrial setting Example.
name_original: Equipment Replacement in an Industrial setting Example.
description:
"W" and "S" to move forward and backward, Shift plus "W" to run

"A" and "D" to move side to side

"1" and "2" to turn Laser Scan on and off

"3" and "4" to switch from old valve to new valve

Left mouse button to select items to be removed. Click again to add item back
